      • testRemoveFromTable

        public final void testRemoveFromTable()
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Testing remotion of an entry from a table. The table will no more contain the removed record. Exception will be thrown when set an invalid FileType
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • testGetTableName

        public final void testGetTableName()
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        GetTableName(fileType) will return the appropriate name of the table for the type indicated by "fileType". The return value will correspond to the expected table name The functions throw an Exception if FileType is not recognized.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • testUpdateClicked

        public final void testUpdateClicked()
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Allow to check or uncheck a record specified by the key value 'name' and 'fileType' Column 'CHECKED' of record 'name' in table 'getTableName(fileType) will be modified. if 'name' equals to '*' all the records of the fileType indicated will be updated
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
